feature_model.name: Wget Product Line

meta.data: Roberto Lopez-Herrejon based on N. Siegmund dissertation

feature_model.feature_tree: :r wget (wget) :m base (base) :o output_file (output_file) :o server_response (server_response) :o no_clobber (no_clobber) :o no_dns_cache (no_dns_cache) :o verbosity (verbosity) :g [1,1] : no_verbose (no_verbose) : verbose (verbose) : quiet (quiet) :o no_directories (no_directories) :o no_host_directories (no_host_directories) :o no_http_keep_alive (no_http_keep_alive) :o no_cookies (no_cookies) :o save_headers (save_headers) :o convert_links (convert_links) :o strict_comments (strict_comments)
